<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A save to TPIDR2 should be followed by clearing TPIDR2&#95;EL0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;WriteIntr =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a0cff8be0190d8e20b7cf13646f34afa2">Intrinsic::getOrInsertDeclaration</a>(M, Intrinsic::aarch64&#95;sme&#95;set&#95;tpidr2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ab086c5b9f9563eda0cdd703f454e041e">CreateCall</a>(WriteIntr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a21075305f0e463b24aafc2fb99514ace">getFunctionType</a>(), WriteIntr,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a73f286a780fbb8c82c0a8574540719ea">getInt64</a>(0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This function generates code at the beginning and end of a function marked</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// with either &#96;aarch64&#95;new&#95;za&#96; or &#96;aarch64&#95;new&#95;zt0&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// At the beginning of the function, the following code is generated:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  - Commit lazy-save if active   &#91;Private-ZA Interface&#42;&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  - Enable PSTATE.ZA             &#91;Private-ZA Interface&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  - Zero ZA                      &#91;Has New ZA State&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  - Zero ZT0                     &#91;Has New ZT0 State&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42; A function with new ZT0 state will not change ZA, so committing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// lazy-save is not strictly necessary. However, the lazy-save mechanism</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// may be active on entry to the function, with PSTATE.ZA set to 1 If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the new ZT0 function calls a function that does not share ZT0, we will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// need to conditionally SMSTOP ZA before the call, setting PSTATE.ZA to 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// For this reason, it&#39;s easier to always commit the lazy-save at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// beginning of the function regardless of whether it has ZA state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// At the end of the function, PSTATE.ZA is disabled if the function has a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Private-ZA Interface. A function is considered to have a Private-ZA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// interface if it does not share ZA or ZT0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SMEABI::updateNewStateFunctions(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &#42;M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smeattrs">SMEAttrs</a> FnAttrs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Context = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getContext();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;OrigBB = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getEntryBlock();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ace45cae6925c65e9d6916e09dd5b17cc">SetInsertPoint</a>(&amp;OrigBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a63cfb2a0dae69153fd961eb335949caa">front</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Commit any active lazy-saves if this is a Private-ZA function. If the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value read from TPIDR2&#95;EL0 is not null on entry to the function then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the lazy-saving scheme is active and we should call &#95;&#95;arm&#95;tpidr2&#95;save</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to commit the lazy save.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FnAttrs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smeattrs/#abee68000498a270e17c4979e748d96b7">hasPrivateZAInterface</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create the new blocks for reading TPIDR2&#95;EL0 &amp; enabling ZA state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SaveBB = OrigBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a52c990590792c91dd20b6d45acebe359">splitBasicBlock</a>(OrigBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a0ed5f3ab3c2e4196ee0cffffa080c062">begin</a>(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;save.za&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;PreludeBB = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4a5b798214be930cf8e133c032ba0129">BasicBlock::Create</a>(Context, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;prelude&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, SaveBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Read TPIDR2&#95;EL0 in PreludeBB &amp; branch to SaveBB if not 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ace45cae6925c65e9d6916e09dd5b17cc">SetInsertPoint</a>(PreludeBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;TPIDR2Intr =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a0cff8be0190d8e20b7cf13646f34afa2">Intrinsic::getOrInsertDeclaration</a>(M, Intrinsic::aarch64&#95;sme&#95;get&#95;tpidr2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;TPIDR2 = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ab086c5b9f9563eda0cdd703f454e041e">CreateCall</a>(TPIDR2Intr-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#a21075305f0e463b24aafc2fb99514ace">getFunctionType</a>(), TPIDR2Intr,</span></CodeLine>
